meanings.definition: Not officially connected or associated with an organization or group.
meanings.sent1: She is a nonaffiliated artist, working independently on her paintings.
meanings.sent2: The nonaffiliated volunteer helped clean up the park without any ties to a specific group.
meanings.sent3: The nonaffiliated cat wandered around the neighborhood, not belonging to any owner.
meanings.sent4: The nonaffiliated cloud floated freely in the sky, not part of any storm system.
meanings.sent5: The nonaffiliated student stood out in the crowd, not part of any club or team.

meanings.definition: Not allied or affiliated with a particular political party or organization.
meanings.sent1: He remained nonaffiliated with any political party, choosing to vote based on policies.
meanings.sent2: The nonaffiliated candidate ran for office without backing from a specific party.
meanings.sent3: The nonaffiliated squirrel gathered nuts without any political agenda.
meanings.sent4: The nonaffiliated star shone brightly in the night sky, not part of any constellation.
meanings.sent5: The nonaffiliated tree stood tall in the forest, not part of any political alliance.
